content.raw:
How about naming the generated files:

`final_<terrain_index>_<search_area>_<vegetation>_<num_vehicles>.world`

Le'ts give camp roberts a terrain index of 1. Then the world files would be:

`final_01_02_low_10.world`

`final_01_02_medium_10.world`

`final_01_02_high_10.world`

etc

Le'ts give camp roberts a terrain index of 1. Then the world files would be:
